tool_description:
Free, Simple REST API for
Live News & Blog Articles
Scalable JSON API delivering worldwide news,
headlines and blog articles in real-time
name: mediastack
title: mediastack

api_list.name: get
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://mediastack.p.rapidapi.com/api.mediastack.com/v1/news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mediastack.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://mediastack.p.rapidapi.com/api.mediastack.com/v1/news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mediastack.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
